abstract: UBS said on Thursday that it has hired Peter Baccile as a joint global head of real estate, leisure and lodging investment banking.
snippet: UBS said on Thursday that it has hired Peter Baccile as a joint global head of real estate, leisure and lodging investment banking.
lead_paragraph: UBS said on Thursday that it has hired Peter Baccile as a joint global head of real estate, leisure and lodging investment banking. Mr. Baccile, who was most recently at JPMorgan Chase, will lead the UBS real estate group with Jackson Hsieh and will report to Matthew Grounds and Simon Warshaw.

headline.main: UBS Hires Global Co-Head of Real Estate

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
